name.baseName: Waterways Sediment ; Sediment ex-situ Remediation ; Dredging
河道沉积物;清淤、疏浚;底泥异位修复

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 疏浚是处理受污染沉积物的一种广泛使用的方法。疏浚物可以通过物理过程进行清理。
Dredging has been a widely used approach in addressing contaminated sediment. The dredged materials may be cleanup by using physical processes.

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: dredging over 2500 m of waterways and sediments generated during the process

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The studied project was part of the development at the London Olympics Park.
研究项目是伦敦奥林匹克公园开发项目的一部分。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The project consisted of dredging over 2500 m of waterways. It was estimated that nearly 30,000 m3 of dredging materials would be generated, including near 2700 m3 hazardous materials.
该项目包括疏浚2500多米的水道。据估计，将产生近30000立方米的疏浚材料，其中包括近2700立方米的危险材料。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The dredging process described is used for environmental remediation of waterways by removing contaminated sediments. This process is part of the London Olympics Park development and is particularly applied to clear over 2500 meters of water channels, with an emphasis on the safe removal and subsequent treatment of nearly 30000 cubic meters of dredged material, including around 2700 cubic meters of hazardous substances. It is suitable for large-scale environmental restoration projects that require the extraction of sediment from aquatic systems to improve water quality and ecosystem health.
本描述的疏浚过程用于通过清除被污染的沉积物来对河道进行环境修复。该过程是伦敦奥林匹克公园开发的一部分，尤其适用于清理超过2500米的水渠，重点是安全移除和随后处理将近30000立方米的疏浚物料，包括约2700立方米的危险物质。它适合需要从水体系统中提取沉积物以改善水质和生态系统健康的大规模环境恢复项目。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Hou D, et al. Using a hybrid LCA method to evaluate the sustainability of sediment remediation at the London Olympic Park. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2014, 83 87-95.
Hou D, et al. Using a hybrid LCA method to evaluate the sustainability of sediment remediation at the London Olympic Park. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2014, 83 87-95.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, consider the scope of the dredging process specifically in the context of the London Olympics Park development. Pay attention to the inclusion of diesel consumption data as the only energy input for the dredging operation as described. Ensure that hazard material handling and potential downstream processing such as physical remediation are taken into account. Apply this data set within the boundaries of similar environmental remediation projects and cautiously adjust it for projects with a differing context or scale.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，需特别考虑伦敦奥林匹克公园开发项目中疏浚过程的范围。关注数据集中描述的只包括疏浚作业能量输入的柴油消耗数据。确保考虑危险物质处理和可能的下游处理过程，如物理修复。在类似的环境修复项目中应用此数据集，并对于与描述环境或规模不同的项目谨慎调整。

completeness.common:other: Only including the amount of diesel used in the dredging process
仅包含疏浚过程使用的柴油量

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 包含Non-hazardous sediment volume （26431 m3）Hazardous sediment can be washed （1877 m3）Hazardous sediment cannot be washed （789 m3）
